Class HDLC.FrameInputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.InputStream
java.io.FilterInputStream
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ntcip.HDLC.FrameInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
Enclosing class:
HDLC
public static class HDLC.FrameInputStream extends FilterInputStream
A FilterInputStream which reads messages framed with a FLAG octet and performs a transparency technique to collapse ESCAPE sequences into single octets. It also computes a CRC and compares it with the frame check sequence.

Note: this class does not extend BufferedInputStream because of timing problems associated with filling the buffer.

Author:
Douglas Lau

    • scanEscapes

      protected void scanEscapes() throws ParsingException
      Scan and replace escape sequences. Replaces ESCAPE followed by FLAG ^ BIT6 with FLAG and ESCAPE followed by ESCAPE ^ BIT6 with ESCAPE.
      Throws:
      ParsingException
